posts.post_title: FS T206 AB 460 and 350 Framed HOFers and T213-2 Huggins (PRICE DROPS)

Looking to sell a couple more tough backed HOFers.  I was able to upgrade these spots in the rotation.  Prices are delivered, Paypal gift is preferred method of payment.  Check out the other stuff included SGC 98 Tiffany Mattingly in the new stuff section.
Would also trade for PSA 4 Sovereign 150 Evers Port, or a trade involving a Cycle Eddie Collins (PSA 2, Frank?! or SGC 50, David?!), or American Beauty E. Collins (any condition!!)

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
